attributes.action: Review the local planning process that follows rules not opinions
attributes.additional_details: The government wants to build more houses, but the only people able to do this are large firms that employ expensive planners and solicitors. The need for more houses can be helped by the Lay person too.
attributes.background: Remove the opinion of planners. Set none woolly rules that can be followed and adhered to, as a pose to the subjective opinion of planners
